real.title: The real schema
real.description: Position in the compressed, BGZip, stream of the begning of the 64Kb block.

bytes.title: The bytes schema
bytes.description: Position in the decompressed stream where the bin begins.

bin_pos.title: The bin_pos schema
bin_pos.description: Chromosome position in which the bin starts.

first_pos.title: The first_pos schema
first_pos.description: Chromosome position in which the 64 Kb block starts.

last_pos.title: The last_pos schema
last_pos.description: Chromosome position in which the 64 Kb block ends.

col_beg.title: The col_beg schema
col_beg.description: Column for the start of a region.

col_end.title: The col_end schema
col_end.description: Column for the end of a region.

skip.title: The skip schema
skip.description: # lines to skip at the beginning.

chunk_begin.title: The chunk_begin schema
chunk_begin.description: Coordinates of the begining of the chunks.

anyOf.title: The first anyOf schema
anyOf.description: Coordinates of the begining of each chunk.

chunk_end.title: The chunk_end schema
chunk_end.description: Coordinates of the end of the chunks.

anyOf.title: The first anyOf schema
anyOf.description: Coordinates of the end of each chunk.

chunks_end.title: The chunks_end schema
chunks_end.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

anyOf.title: The first anyOf schema
anyOf.description: File offset of the first record in the interval.
